name: wood cladding production, softwood | residual wood, dry | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/13271/documentation

This dataset represents the production of stained solid softwood cladding in the region of Quebec for outdoor use. Wood cladding is an exterior wall cladding, which consists of wood boards of different cross-sections (see figure) sawn out of beams (softwood in this case) and then stained. They are most of the time installed on house walls, horizontally or vertically jointed. The functional unit represents 1 m² of covered exterior wall with stained wood cladding. The average overlap of the installed cladding on the wall is 20% (overlap area / board area).

This activity starts with the raw material delivery at the factory gate.

This activity ends with the ready for shipping packaged softwood wood cladding at the factory gate. 
The dataset includes the raw materials and energy consumption for production, waste generation, estimation of the infrastructure (approximation) and VOC emissions. The colour and acrylic varnish components are directly included since the composition information has been provided by the data provider through Material Safety Data Sheets for these inputs. The included components represent 99.15% of the combined total mass of the colour and acrylic varnish.
The dataset does not include LDPE film as primary packaging (0.09 kg LDPE/m² of cladding) according to ecoinvent guidelines.
category: C:Manufacturing/16:Manufacture of wood and of products of wood and cork, except furniture; manufacture of articles of straw and plaiting materials/162:Manufacture of products of wood, cork, straw and plaiting materials/1622:Manufacture of builders' carpentry and joinery

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data from a single manufacturing company in the region of Québec. They are used as average for the region of Québec.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Composition data for the colour and acrylic varnish were provided for 90% of the colour and 98.5% of the acrylic varnish total mass, these were then extrapolated, i.e. scaled-up, to the total mass.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Data based on questionnaire from one manufacturing company, except for the infrastructure which is based on standard assumptions on plant lifetime and annual production volume.

exchanges.description: Calculated values, see Exchange Properties. Includes sawdust and planer shavings.

exchanges.description:
Proxy. 
Calculated amount from reported measured amounts of colour and acrylic varnish and composition information from the Material Safety Data Sheets provided for these by the data providing wood cladding manufacturing company (the average value was used as default when the component content was given in the form of a range of values), giving 0,002914659 kg of Al(OH)3/m2 of wood cladding.
Measured amount given by data providing wood cladding manufacturing company, reported as polyaluminium chloride used in cleaning water treatment. According to the Material Safety Data Sheet provided, the product contains 15-40% polyaluminium choride with CAS 39290-78-3, whose formula, from http://chem.sis.nlm.nih.gov/chemidplus/rn/39290-78-3, is AlClHO5S with MW = 175.504 which gives 26.982/175.504 = 15.374% Al. According to http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polyaluminium_chloride, aluminium hydroxide Al(OH)3 MW = 78.0027 which gives 26.982/78.0027 = 34.591% Al, can be used as raw material to produce polyaluminium chlorides.
Since there is no exact dataset for this intermediary product, it was modelled as the corresponding amount of aluminium from Al(OH)3, giving 0,000752177 kg Al(OH)3/m2 of wood cladding.

exchanges.description:
Proxy. Reported as nepheline syenite (according to http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nepheline_syenite, a holocrystalline plutonic rock that consists largely of nepheline and alkali feldspar).

exchanges.description: Proxy. Calculated amount from reported measured amounts of acrylic varnish and since acrylic binder does not appear in the composition information from the Material Safety Data Sheets provided for the varnishes by the data providing wood cladding manufacturing company, the amount of acrylic binder, without water, in 34% solution state indicated in the ecoinvent v3.0 data "acrylic varnish, without water, in 87.5% solution state, GLO 2001" was used combined with the varnish solution concentration indicated (87.5%), giving 0.5 kg/kg acrylic varnish, without water x 87.5% = 0.4375 kg acrylic binder/kg acrylic varnish solution.
